subtitle: A Rose Elliot recipe.

method.text: Fry the celery and red pepper in the oil in a large saucepan for 10 min, until soft but not browned.
Stir in the curry powder, then add the sweetcorn and butter beans. Cook over a gentle heat for 4-5 min, until heated through. Season. sprinkle with chopped parsley and serve.

title: Multicolour butter beans
